name: Gourmet Grilled Cheese on Rye
author: spatulove
summary: Savory grilled cheese with a little extra decadence. In my family, we all have different tastes. This recipe is to my liking, but please feel free to experiment with different types of cheese and seasonings.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
¼ cup marinated artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
directions: Heat grapeseed oil in a large skillet over medium heat; saute onion until softened and slightly browned, 5 to 10 minutes
Transfer onion to a small bowl, reserving the oil in the skillet
Lightly brush each bread slice with grapeseed oil from the skillet and season with salt and pepper
Arrange half the bread slices, oil-side down, in the skillet
Top each bread slice with 1 slice Gouda cheese, 1 slice provolone cheese, artichoke hearts, and onion; top with remaining bread slices, oil-side up
Cook sandwiches until bread is browned and crispy and cheeses are melted, about 4 minutes per side
Slice each sandwich in half to serve
